name: Dill-Infused Deviled Eggs with Bacon Crumble
author: Jahmbean
summary: Why not try something a little different than your average deviled egg? Dill makes this simple recipe come to life with flavor and the bacon is... Well bacon, do I need to explain any further?
directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil
Place in a bowl under cold running water until cool enough to handle
Peel eggs in the bowl of water
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain on paper towels; crumble into small pieces
Cut eggs in half lengthwise and scoop yolks into a bowl
Add mayonnaise, dill, honey mustard, white vinegar, salt, and pepper; whisk until smooth
Spoon or pipe yolk mixture into the egg whites
Garnish with bacon crumbles and paprika
